channel.title: Problem with Custom Item (Item wont Work =[ )
channel.description:
Ok so i made my own custom item and so yea here it is.
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/p55sk.jpg[/img]
Its not much i just thought it looked cool i was fooling around with meta. I came up with this so yea. I made my own Ints for it and these are them
[code]}
if(i == 19516){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 61785;//Inv & Ground class8.anInt181 = 2000; class8.anInt190 = 560; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 25; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = 61784;//Male Wield View class8.anInt200 = 61784;//Female Wield View class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Zamorak Scimitar";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "A Scimitar smithed by the Zamorak Lords!".getBytes();//examin info } [/code]
I have my Models (i think).
I compile go in do add model ####
it all works log out compile again come back in do [code]::pickup 19516 1[/code]
and it just freezes me and Disconects me from my client.
My client gets this error when it disconnects me
[code]Welcome to Sesmascape
Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 61785 at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.method462(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:121) at Class8.method201(Class8.java:6495) at Class8.method200(Class8.java:6367) at client.method105(client.java:7872) at client.method36(client.java:1413) at client.method102(client.java:7574) at client.method9(client.java:8454) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:122) at client.run(client.java:4250) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
Does anyone know what i did wrong?
[b]BTW[/b]
For my models i did one .dat format of my item in a players hand shown like here
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/p55sk.jpg[/img]
and for the other model i did one of the Scimmy lying on the floor ([b]I dont know exactly how to do models)[/b] Shown here
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/15ogvtg.jpg[/img]
So thats all the information i can think of to give u guys does anyone know what i did wrong here?
Or any ideas atleast?

item.title: Problem with Custom Item (Item wont Work =[ )
item.dc:creator: @Spyguy439 Spyguy439
item.description:
@Spyguy439 wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:4, topic:240138”]Did you read the error.

Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 61785

Notice the number 61785?
It’s saying you used a too high number, rename it to something less.[/quote]

Hay CJ, when i try to add a 5# ID it says i have to use a 4# Id can u help?

Read full topic
item.source: Problem with Custom Item (Item wont Work =[ )

item.title: Problem with Custom Item (Item wont Work =[ )
item.dc:creator: @rune_sleep rune_sleep
item.description:
@rune_sleep wrote:

As you seen SilentJC Tutorial(Anyway nice tutorial Silent) Try Adding the add model command. And Make the number more smaller (ID).

	if(s.startsWith("add model"))
{
 try
 {
   int ModelIndex = Integer.parseInt(s.substring(10));
    byte[] abyte0 = GetModel(ModelIndex);
     if(abyte0 != null && abyte0.length > 0){
       aClass14Array970[1].method234(abyte0.length, abyte0, (byte)2, ModelIndex);
       method77("All Models Added Successfully.", 0, "", aBoolean991);
}else{
       method77("Unable to find the model. "+ModelIndex, 0, "", aBoolean991);
 }
}
 catch(Exception e)
  {
	  method77("Syntax - ::add model <path>", 0, "", aBoolean991);}

Try adding that dude

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with Custom Item (Item wont Work =[ )
item.dc:creator: @Varmisher5150 Varmisher5150
item.description:
@Varmisher5150 wrote:

Ok so i made my own custom item and so yea here it is.

p55sk.jpg1024×768

Its not much i just thought it looked cool i was fooling around with meta. I came up with this so yea. I made my own Ints for it and these are them

[code]}

if(i == 19516){
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wield”;
class8.anInt174 = 61785;//Inv & Ground
class8.anInt181 = 2000;
class8.anInt190 = 560;
class8.anInt198 = 0;
class8.anInt169 = 25;
class8.anInt194 = 1;
class8.anInt165 = 61784;//Male Wield View
class8.anInt200 = 61784;//Female Wield View
class8.anInt164 = -1;
class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves //
class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable
class8.aString170 = “Zamorak Scimitar”;//Name of the new item
class8.aByteArray178 = “A Scimitar smithed by the Zamorak Lords!”.getBytes();//examin info
}
[/code]

I have my Models (i think).

I compile go in do add model ####

it all works log out compile again come back in do

::pickup 19516 1

and it just freezes me and Disconects me from my client.

My client gets this error when it disconnects me

[code]Welcome to Sesmascape

Exception in thread “Thread-3” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 61785
at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.method462(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:121)
at Class8.method201(Class8.java:6495)
at Class8.method200(Class8.java:6367)
at client.method105(client.java:7872)
at client.method36(client.java:1413)
at client.method102(client.java:7574)
at client.method9(client.java:8454)
at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:122)
at client.run(client.java:4250)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
[/code]

Does anyone know what i did wrong?

BTW

For my models i did one .dat format of my item in a players hand shown like here

p55sk.jpg1024×768

and for the other model i did one of the Scimmy lying on the floor (I dont know exactly how to do models) Shown here

So thats all the information i can think of to give u guys does anyone know what i did wrong here?

Or any ideas atleast?
